subject: Football
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: The Jaguars proved that they were able copycats of a style that has defined the Steelers, withstanding a furious 18-point comeback by the Steelers in the fourth quarter and kicking a 25-yard field goal to win in the final 37 seconds.
snippet: The Jaguars proved that they were able copycats of a style that has defined the Steelers, withstanding a furious 18-point comeback by the Steelers in the fourth quarter and kicking a 25-yard field goal to win in the final 37 seconds.
